description: The energy strategy also aims to more than halve emissions in the next 10 years.
title: Guernsey targets 'net zero' greenhouse gas emissions by 2050
title_page: Guernsey targets 'net zero' greenhouse gas emissions by 2050 - BBC News
maintext: Deputy Brehaut said: "With the flexibility that is built into this policy, it can adapt to the challenges we face now and in the future."
